name: Aru
quote: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency. – Austin Freeman

name: Krishna
quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code. – John Johnson

name: Samridhi Garg
quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad. – Cory House

name: Arindam Gupta
quote: The best way to get a project done faster is to start sooner. – Jim Highsmith

name: Aashima Mittal
quote: Innovation is the outcome of a habit, not a random act. – Sukant Ratnakar

name: Ankit Kumar
quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes. – Oscar Wilde

name: Mohit
quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear simple. – Grady Booch

name: Anurag
quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday’s code. – Dan Salomon

name: Hitanshu Bansal
quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works. – Steve Jobs

name: Arnav Kamboj
quote: If you automate a mess, you get an automated mess. – Rod Michael

name: Manavi Arora
quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute. – Harold Abelson

name: Aman Anand
quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning. – Bill Gates

name: Mrityunjay Singh
quote: Bad design is smoke, while good design is a mirror. – Juan-Carlos Fernandez

name: Abhinav Singh
quote: Learning to write programs stretches your mind and helps you think better. – Bill Gates
